entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
